mapper.select: select * from orders order by order_num
mapper.insert: insert into orders(order_num, user_id, rec_name, rec_contact_num, rec_postcode, rec_addr, rec_detail_addr, hope_deli_date, request, payment, price, flower_num, amount) values((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(ORDERS_ORDERNUM_SEQ.nextval,2,0)), #{userId}, #{recName}, #{recContactNum}, #{recPostCode}, #{recAddr}, #{recDetailAddr}, #{hopeDeliDate}, #{request}, #{payment}, #{price}, #{flowerNum}, #{amount})
